Repeat element for each item in data sou: Repeat element for each item in data source.
The HTML attributes that are added to th: The HTML attributes that are added to the HTML element. For example: ‘title‘, ‘href‘. If ‘class’ or ‘style’ is added as attribute this is merged with the widget class/style property. For events (e.g. onClick) use the Events section.
Name: Name
Configuration for HTML sanitization in J: Configuration for HTML sanitization in JSON format. Leave blank for default.
